Contact 
Get in Touch
Request Information 
How may we be of service?

Your next social gathering or corporate event deserves the very best, which is just what you'll find at the Market Pavilion Hotel. As a venue, we offer a one-of-a-kind, historic Charleston setting. As a top hotel with two world-class restaurants, Grill 225 and the Pavilion Bar, we ensure a pristine experience and the finest cuisine for your guests. .

Special Occasions

Of course you want your guests to eat, drink and be merry, so host your next special occasion at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Perfect for intimate showers, sophisticated luncheons, cocktail receptions, or lavish weddings, we have the indoor or outdoor venue that's just right for you.

Corporate Events

Host your next meeting or corporate event with the latest advanced technology and a sense of style at the Market Pavilion Hotel. Want to make it memorable? Let us customize it for you with creative ideas to energize and surprise your guests with all that is bespoke Charleston.

Private Event Dining

The private and semi-private areas of Market Pavilion Hotel, Grill 225, and the Pavilion atop the Market Pavilion Hotel are the perfect place to celebrate all of life's happy occassions, from an engagement party to an unforgettable 50th anniversary soiree.
Hotel Reservations Grill 225 Reservations Information Request Events

Infinite Celebrations

The Pavilion Bar is a rooftop must-do, complete with views of historic Charleston, a cascading pool, signature cocktails, eclectic cuisine offerings and the city's most spectacular sunsets. The Pavilion Bar maintains a sophisticated and stylish atmosphere for its guests. 
 Opens daily at Noon.

Cheers

Truly the lap of luxury, retreat to Charleston's only rooftop cascading pool. Sip on one of our signature cocktails, or enjoy a selection from our extensive champagne menu or wine list.
View our Drink Menu 
Savor

Enjoy the casual but superb fare from the Pavilion Bar. It features only the finest 100% USDA Prime Beef and freshest seafood, as well as an eclectic assortment of inspired local salads, flatbreads, shareable bites, and curated cocktails.
View our Food Menu 
VIP Tables

Enjoy a private table reservation that includes an array of amenities such as: beverages from our renowned wine, cocktail and champagne menus as well as cuisine from the Pavilion Bar menu.
VIP Tables Hotel Reservations Grill 225 Reservations Information Request Events
